name: Dragon's Toll
description:
You control a mighty dragon in need for gold for his hoard as all dragon's do. As one might say, there is nothing better than to get coins from low level adventurer's.

Avoid the deadly weapon's thrown at you and get all the money you can to buy upgrades and evolve your dragon in this epic action game.
